title: Remove List Elements from the End
description: In Python, you can remove elements from a list using various methods. One such method is to remove elements from the end of the list. In this challenge, you will write a function that removes n elements from the end of a list.

meta.title: Python | List Manipulation | Remove Elements from End
meta.description: Learn how to remove elements from the end of a list in Python. Explore the take_right() function and its usage with examples.
meta.keywords: Python, list manipulation, remove elements, end of list, take_right

steps.title: Remove List Elements from the End

verify.name: Verify Student's Python Script Execution
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 从列表末尾移除元素

meta.title: Python | 列表操作 | 从末尾移除元素
meta.description: 学习如何在Python中从列表末尾移除元素。探索take_right()函数及其使用示例。
